metadata.title: CVE-2024-45679 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in Assimp versions prior to 5.4.3allows a local attacker to execute arbitrary code by importing a speciallycrafted file into the product.

criterions.comment: assimp package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
